alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Lower Rio Grande Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Southwest Chaves County; Upper Tularosa Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 30 at 6:58AM MDT until October 30 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area, Lower Rio Grande Valley, Upper Tularosa Valley, Chaves County Plains, and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent water pipes from freezing, wrap, drain or allow them to drip slowly.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; Lower Rio Grande Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Southwest Chaves County; Upper Tularosa Valley
